name: WÜTHRICH® CLARIFIED BUTTER (9465)
description: WÜTHRICH® CLARIFIED BUTTER (9465) is developed in the finest European tradition. Our clarified butter is 99.9% pure butterfat, formulated with our world champion butter for a full, rich flavor. Clarified butter has a higher smoke point than normal butter and cooking oils, making it perfect for creating sauces such as hollandaise and bearnaise.
